h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Stepping outside, you can see a long path down the left leading up and out of the prison at the far end, but walking the path is another tough Red-Haired Yaksha to deal with first.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Upper Pagoda (Level 4)'.
The content is as follows:
Stepping outside, you can see a long path down the left leading up and out of the prison at the far end, but walking the path is another tough Red-Haired Yaksha to deal with first.
